arts.ttl: Monza Set to Sign Silvere Ganvoula from Young Boys
arts.sum: Monza are on the verge of securing a new attacking option as they close in on the signing of Silvere Ganvoula from Swiss side Young Boys. The 28-year-old Congolese striker has already arrived in the city and met with club CEO Adriano Galliani, signaling that the deal is in its final stages. The post Monza Set to Sign Silvere Ganvoula from Young Boys appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Ibrahimovic Blocks Camarda’s Move to Monza, Keeping Young Talent at Milan
arts.sum: In a surprising turn of events, Francesco Camarda's anticipated loan move to Monza has been halted by AC Milan, with Zlatan Ibrahimovic playing a pivotal role in the decision. The young striker, who had already agreed to the transfer, will now remain with the Rossoneri for the remainder of the season. The post Ibrahimovic Blocks Camarda’s Move to Monza, Keeping Young Talent at Milan appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Monza 0-1 Verona: Match Report
arts.sum: In a crucial Serie A clash, bottom-placed Monza suffered a devastating 1-0 defeat against fellow relegation battlers Verona, pushing them closer to the drop. The match was decided by an unfortunate own goal from Monza's Stefan Lekovic, who clumsily bundled the ball into his own net following a Verona attack. The post Serie A | Monza 0-1 Verona: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Atalanta Rebuff Monza’s Interest in Marco Palestra
arts.sum: As the January transfer window enters its final hours, Atalanta have made it clear that young talent Marco Palestra is not for sale, despite interest from Monza. The 19-year-old winger, who has already made five Serie A appearances this season, will remain with the Bergamo-based club. The post Atalanta Rebuff Monza’s Interest in Marco Palestra appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Daniel Maldini, son of soccer great Paolo, joins Atalanta from Monza
arts.sum: Daniel Maldini, the son of soccer great Paolo Maldini, completed his move to title-chasing Atalanta from bottom-club Monza on Saturday. He became the third Maldini to win a Serie A title with Milan in 2022 before leaving for loan spells at Spezia and Empoli, and then joining Monza in January 2024.

arts.ttl: Verona Secure Loan Deal for Fiorentina’s Nicolás Valentini
arts.sum: Hellas Verona have made a significant move in the final hours of the January transfer window, reaching an agreement with Fiorentina for the loan of defender Nicolás Valentini. Gianluca Di Marzio reports that the deal, which comes just weeks after Valentini's arrival in Florence, will see the Argentine centre-back don the yellow and blue colours of Verona for the remainder of the season. The post Verona Secure Loan Deal for Fiorentina’s Nicolás Valentini appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Official: Daniel Maldini joins Atalanta from Monza for 13m
arts.sum: Daniel Maldini has completed his transfer from Monza to Atalanta for circa €13m, with half...

Atalanta have officially announced the signing of Daniel Maldini from AC Monza on a permanent transfer. The 23-year-old attacker joins the Bergamo-based club after a series of loan spells and a brief stint with Monza. The post OFFICIAL: Atalanta Sign Daniel Maldini appeared first on FootItalia.com.
